players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Charlie is a mafioso, I investigated him last night and discovered his true role."
Charlie: "I have no information to share at this time."
Diana: "Charlie is a mafioso, I investigated him last night and discovered his true role. Please be cautious when interacting with them."
Charlie: "I have no reason to harm the village, I will cooperate with everyone and work towards identifying the real mafioso among us."
You: "I believe Diana's claim about Charlie being a mafioso might be premature. Let's consider the possibility that she was mistaken or manipulated by the real mafioso."
